snippet.title: Asteroid Colony - Short Trailer
snippet.description:
The short version of the #trailer for Asteroid Colony. 

In this real time strategy city builder game you will help humanity reaching beyond earth by establishing a permanent and thriving settlement in the asteroid belt. Settling in space comes with enormous challenges and dangers, which you will have to guide your people through.

Add Asteroid Colony to your #Steam wishlist with the following link https://store.steampowered.com/app/2461760/Asteroid_Colony/

Music: "Vivaldi's Four Seasons: Winter Allegro non molto" performed by The Modena Orchestra

#asteroidcolony #wishlist #gaming #gamingvideos #pcgaming #pc #strategygames #rts #realtimestrategygames #space #rocket #rockets #spaceexploration #asteroid
